AdminAndManagementFlows.account_settings_scope: Which types of account settings should users be able to manage in the app (e.g. personal info, security settings, notification preferences, linked cards)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.activity_management_scope: Which management capabilities are needed for badminton activities (e.g. creating events, editing details, cancelling events, managing courts and time slots)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_access_scopes: Should different admin users see different subsets of management features (e.g. only logs vs. full configuration)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_access_to_deployments: Should only specific admin or maintainer roles be allowed to approve and trigger script deployments after audit passes?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_action_auditing: Should admin actions in the panel (e.g. edits, deletions, configuration changes) be tracked with an audit log?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_backend_scope: What additional admin or management capabilities (e.g. user management, environment management, API grouping) should the API management backend include beyond basic CRUD on APIs?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_configuration_scope: Which configuration options beyond file locations and sync schedules should admins be able to manage (e.g. QR code settings, access permissions, application parameters)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_dashboard_capabilities: Which capabilities should the admin dashboard include (e.g. user management, investment product management, referral oversight, transaction monitoring)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_dashboard_scope: What main management sections (e.g. user management, system configuration, logs) should the admin dashboard expose and how should they be grouped?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_dashboard_structure: What main sections or pages should the backend management system provide for configurations, logs, roles, and functions?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_data_integration_view: What specific data integration views or dashboards should administrators see when reviewing and aggregating farmer-submitted data?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_data_management_scope: Which types of business data should admins be able to browse, create, edit, and delete in the backend management system?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_finance_management_scope: What finance management capabilities should admins have (e.g. payouts to artists, transaction summaries, fee configuration)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_funds_adjustment_rules: Should administrators be able to both add and remove mock funds, and should these changes be logged with reasons?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_game_management_scope: What should game management include (e.g. add/remove games, configure pricing, activate/deactivate, set display order)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_management_capabilities: What admin and editor capabilities do you need for managing breaking news (e.g. approve tips, schedule publishing, edit or remove stories)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_management_for_consultations_and_r: Do you need an admin or staff interface to manage consultations, appointments, and health report data behind the scenes?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_management_of_tests: Should there be an admin or lead role to oversee global test configuration, environments, and overall test campaign management beyond individual user actions?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_management_scope: Should administrators be able to create, edit, and remove attraction entries, reservations, and merchandise items within the mini-program?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_management_sections: Which entities should the admin backend manage in detail (e.g. products, promotion positions, users, orders, commission rules) and what operations are required for each (create, edit, deactivate, delete)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_moderation_tools: Do you need an admin interface to review, approve, or remove adult content and manage creators and subscribers?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_order_management: Do you need an admin interface to manage and track user orders and eSIM availability?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_order_management_scope: Which order management capabilities do you need (e.g. view order history, refund, cancel, reconcile payments)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_panel_scope: What specific admin panel sections (e.g. user management, data management, system settings) and navigation structure do you need within the low-code interface?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_portal_scope: Do you need a separate admin portal for managing users, merchants, products, orders, and payments, distinct from normal user and merchant views?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_product_and_gallery_management: Which actions should admins be able to perform on galleries and products (e.g. create, edit, schedule, approve, archive)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_product_management: Do you need an admin interface for managing products, prices, and inventory separate from the user-facing site?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_spot_management_scope: Should administrators be the only ones allowed to add, delete, modify, and query scenic spot information, or can regular users also perform some of these actions?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_user_capabilities: Should there be dedicated admin users for managing accessory categories, warehouses, and system-wide settings separate from regular operators?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_user_management: Do you need an admin interface to manage users (e.g. view users, edit details, deactivate accounts)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.admin_user_management_scope: What operations should admin user management support (e.g. create/edit/delete users, reset credentials, assign roles)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.alarm_rule_management: What operations are required for alarm rule management (e.g. create templates, clone rules, bulk edit, enable/disable)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.assignment_and_dispatch: How should tasks be assigned or dispatched to maintenance units and technicians (manual assignment, automatic matching by proximity and skills, or both)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.automated_maintenance_operations: What automated database maintenance operations (installation, upgrade, rollback, others) should be supported and how should users trigger or schedule them from the website?
AdminAndManagementFlows.backup_and_recovery_workflows: What backup and recovery workflows should the admin interface guide users through (e.g., scheduled backups, on-demand backups, point-in-time recovery)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.cache_management_capabilities: What cache management actions should be supported (clear all cache, clear by module, view cache status, schedule cache refresh)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.cache_management_controls: What cache management operations should be available in the admin (e.g., clear all cache, clear by channel, clear by single article, scheduled cache refresh)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.citation_style_management_actions: Which management actions should be supported for citation styles (e.g. create, rename, duplicate, delete, set default, version history)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.cluster_management_operations: Which specific cluster management operations (e.g., create, modify, delete clusters, scale up/down nodes) should be supported in the admin flows?
AdminAndManagementFlows.collection_plan_lifecycle: Which lifecycle states should collection plans have (e.g. draft, active, paused, completed) and who can move plans between these states?
AdminAndManagementFlows.collection_scoring_model_management: What actions should admins be able to perform on the collection scoring model (e.g. create, edit, version, activate/deactivate)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.collections_workflow: What actions should the collections function support for overdue orders (e.g. reminders, escalation steps, notes, disabling further purchases)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.content_lifecycle_management: What stages of the article lifecycle (draft, review, scheduled, published, archived) should editors be able to manage explicitly?
AdminAndManagementFlows.data_management_scope: What operations should data management support (e.g. import, export, tagging, archival, deletion, versioning)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.device_management_capabilities: Which device management actions are required (e.g. register devices, group devices, monitor status, firmware updates)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.device_management_scope: What kinds of device management actions should be supported (e.g. add/remove devices, edit configuration, remote control, grouping)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.discount_management_scope: What operations should discount management support (e.g., create coupons, set rules and validity, disable or delete discounts)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.employee_management_operations: Should admins be able to add, disable, and remove employee accounts directly within the mini-program?
AdminAndManagementFlows.employee_permissions_scope: Which permission levels or roles should employees have (e.g. voucher verification only, full product editing, balance withdrawal approval)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.entity_management_permissions: Should there be restrictions on who can create, edit, or delete projects, personnel records, laboratories, and fund records?
AdminAndManagementFlows.environment_separation: Should the management flows clearly separate environments such as development, testing, staging, and production for big data and databases?
AdminAndManagementFlows.file_location_management: What types of file locations should admins be able to configure (local server paths, cloud storage, shared drives, URLs) and how many can be configured?
AdminAndManagementFlows.fund_management_scope: Which fund management functions should be available (e.g. budget allocation per project, expense tracking, approvals, remaining balance)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.generated_artifacts_management: What management actions should admins have on generated artifacts such as tables, controllers, models, views, JS, language packages, menus, and recycle bin items (e.g. rename, edit, clone, delete, export)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.ground_station_management: What actions should ground station management include (e.g. register stations, set status, assign devices, configure location and capabilities)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.infrastructure_management_scope: What types of big data and database resources (e.g. clusters, nodes, services, jobs) should admins be able to manage from this website?
AdminAndManagementFlows.laboratory_management_scope: What laboratory management features are needed (e.g. assigning labs to projects, tracking equipment, capacity, usage schedules)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.large_screen_display_management: Do you need configuration flows for managing content layouts and scenes on the large screen display?
AdminAndManagementFlows.log_management_capabilities: What capabilities should log management include (viewing, filtering, exporting, retention settings, deletion)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.low_code_app_lifecycle_management: What kinds of admin flows should the platform provide for managing created apps (e.g. publishing, versioning, deployment, rollback)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.maintenance_operation_safety_controls: Should there be safety controls (e.g. confirmations, environment selection, pre-checks) before running installation, upgrade, or rollback operations?
AdminAndManagementFlows.management_actions_on_jobs: What management actions should users be able to perform on scheduled jobs and data flows (e.g. pause, resume, cancel, retry, manual trigger)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.management_to_client_control_scope: Besides shutdown and task scheduling, should the management end control other client behaviors (e.g. restart, volume, screen on/off)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.menu_management_capabilities: What actions should be supported for menu management (e.g., create menu items, reorder, hide/show, assign to roles)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.menu_management_structure: How should menu items be structured (hierarchy depth, grouping, visibility toggles, ordering) in menu management?
AdminAndManagementFlows.merchant_management_scope: What operations should merchant management support (e.g., create, edit, approve, suspend, delete merchants)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.merchant_onboarding_and_approval: Should there be an approval or review flow before merchants can open a store and start listing products?
AdminAndManagementFlows.merchant_profile_management: What specific merchant information fields should be viewable and editable in the mini-program (e.g. store name, logo, address, contact, payout account)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.monitoring_and_maintenance_flows: What ongoing monitoring and maintenance flows do you need for clusters (e.g., health checks, alert views, maintenance windows)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.monitoring_dashboard_scope: Which monitoring views should admins have for the scheduling process (e.g. overall pipeline health, per-endpoint status, recent errors)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.multi_instance_management: How should admins manage multiple virtualized MikroTik CHR RouterOS instances (e.g. add/remove instances, view status, group or label instances)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.multi_org_collaboration: Should the platform support multi-organization collaboration flows between property owners, maintenance units, and rescue departments with separate views and permissions for each?
AdminAndManagementFlows.order_management_capabilities: Which order management actions should backend staff support (e.g. view orders, update status, cancel orders, issue refunds, export orders)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.order_management_for_merchants: What actions should merchants be able to perform on orders (e.g. confirm, ship, modify address, cancel, refund)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.order_management_granularity: How should admins and institutional users be able to search, filter, and update large, small, and overdue orders (e.g. status changes, write-offs, manual adjustments)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.parent_child_account_structure: What parent and child account structure do you need (e.g. number of children per parent, multiple parent guardians per child)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.participant_management: Should organizers be able to manage participants for each activity (add/remove players, assign to matches, manage substitutes)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.payment_channel_management_scope: What aspects of payment channels should be manageable (enabling/disabling channels, configuration parameters, limits, fees)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.payment_management_actions: Should payment management allow only viewing payment records or also support actions like refunds, adjustments, and reconciliation?
AdminAndManagementFlows.payment_management_dashboard: Do you need an admin interface or dashboard where staff can view, search, and manage all security deposit payments and their statuses?
AdminAndManagementFlows.permission_management_ui: How should administrators manage user permissions and roles in the UI (e.g. user list with role assignment, group-based permissions, bulk updates)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.personal_data_management_scope: What personal management capabilities should users have for their own courses and appointment records (e.g., view only, cancel, edit, delete, export)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.personnel_management_scope: What personnel management actions should be supported (e.g. assigning people to projects, tracking roles, availability, qualifications)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.platform_separation: How functionally distinct should the operation, merchant, and agent platforms be versus sharing common interfaces and modules?
AdminAndManagementFlows.points_management_rules: What actions should point management support (e.g., manual adjustments, point expiration, point transfer, bulk updates)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.product_management_capabilities: Which product management functions do merchants need (e.g. create/edit products, manage stock, categories, SKUs, on/off shelf)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.product_management_scope: What operations should product management support (e.g., create products, edit prices, manage availability, delete or archive products)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.product_status_management: Should admins be able to modify sales status and shelf status individually per product, in bulk, and with any approval or logging requirements?
AdminAndManagementFlows.project_management_scope: Which project management capabilities are needed (e.g. project lifecycle stages, task assignments, milestones, status updates)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.promotions_management: What kinds of promotional activities should admins be able to configure (e.g. discount codes, percentage discounts, bundles, time-limited sales)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.published_content_management: Which actions should editors be able to perform on already published content (edit in place, create updated versions, unpublish, delete, revert to previous version)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.queue_management_capabilities: What queue management operations are needed (view jobs, retry, cancel, prioritize, view job details)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.recycle_bin_behavior: How should the recycle bin work for deleted items (what goes into it, retention time, restore vs. permanent delete behavior)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.refund_and_release_flow: Should the system support flows for releasing, refunding, or partially refunding security deposit payments from an admin area?
AdminAndManagementFlows.remote_client_shutdown_scope: Should remote shutdown apply to individual clients, groups of clients, or all clients at once?
AdminAndManagementFlows.remote_management_capabilities: Should parents be able to change limits and permissions remotely in real time on the child’s device?
AdminAndManagementFlows.report_management_actions: Should report management include scheduling, versioning, approval workflows, or only on-demand creation and download?
AdminAndManagementFlows.resource_release_management: Should there be a dedicated mobile flow for admins to manage resource release (create, update, publish, unpublish resources)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.role_and_permission_management_scope: Which role and permission operations (create roles, assign permissions, copy roles, bulk updates) should be available in permission management?
AdminAndManagementFlows.role_hierarchy_between_admins: Which additional capabilities should Super Admin have compared with Admin (e.g. managing admins, system-wide settings, audit access)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.script_management_capabilities: What management capabilities are needed for Lua scripts and their executions (e.g. listing scripts, versioning, disabling scripts, viewing execution history)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.sensitive_word_blacklist_management: Should admins be able to configure and maintain sensitive word lists and blacklists through a dedicated management interface?
AdminAndManagementFlows.service_catalog_management: What aspects of their services should merchants be able to manage (e.g. create/edit services, pricing, time slots, availability, service areas)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.sync_schedule_controls: How should admins define and control sync schedules (fixed intervals, cron-like schedules, manual trigger, per-file-location settings)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.system_configuration_sections: Which configuration sections (e.g. general settings, security settings, notification settings) should system configuration expose to admins?
AdminAndManagementFlows.task_scheduling_granularity: What scheduling options do you need for sending tasks to clients (e.g. specific date/time, recurring schedules, time zones)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.task_status_lifecycle: Which standard status stages should task management support (e.g. created, dispatched, accepted, on-site, completed, verified)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.task_type_scope: Which types of elevator tasks should administrators be able to create and manage separately (maintenance, repair, rescue, inspection, advertising screen operations, others)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.team_management_structure: Should team management support roles, groups, and assigning members to specific merchants or stations?
AdminAndManagementFlows.ticket_management_usage: Should ticket management handle customer support tickets, service orders, or some other type of ticket, and which actions are needed (create, assign, close)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_account_administration: Do you need an administrative interface to manage user accounts, roles, and access for teachers and students?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_account_management_actions: Which user account operations should admins be able to perform (e.g. create, disable, reset password, assign roles)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_and_permission_admin_flows: What admin pages or flows do you need for creating, editing, and deactivating users and assigning their permissions?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_management_capabilities: Which user management capabilities are needed (e.g. create, deactivate, reset passwords, assign roles)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_management_scope: What operations should user management support (e.g., registration review, profile edit, disable users, reset passwords)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_manager_integration_scope: Which administrative actions over MikroTik User Manager v4 should be available from the dashboard (e.g. read-only stats vs full user and profile management)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.user_portfolio_management_by_admin: To what extent should admins be able to modify user portfolios directly (e.g. adjust positions, close trades, read-only view)?
AdminAndManagementFlows.workload_automation: Which parts of the organizers’ statistical workload should the system automate (e.g. auto-calculating standings, generating summary reports, seeding players)?

AuthenticationAndRoles.activity_access_without_login: Should unauthenticated users be able to browse daily activities and tasks, or is login required before viewing any activity information?
AuthenticationAndRoles.admin_access_scope: What actions should be restricted to admins versus regular users in the app and admin panel?
AuthenticationAndRoles.anonymous_usage: Do you need any guest or anonymous access without registration?
AuthenticationAndRoles.anonymous_usage_capabilities: Should any features (e.g. browsing services, viewing prices) be available without logging in?
AuthenticationAndRoles.anonymous_usage_scope: Which features should be available without login (e.g., browsing and reading only, while favorites and history require an account)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.bypass_protection_for_children: Do you need protections to prevent children from disabling or uninstalling the app or changing its settings without parent authorization?
AuthenticationAndRoles.data_level_access_control: Should permissions restrict access at the level of specific datasets, reports, and dashboards, and if so, how granular should these restrictions be?
AuthenticationAndRoles.entrance_parameter_role_recognition: How should entrance configuration parameters (e.g., URL parameters, QR codes) determine the user role and initial menu shown after login?
AuthenticationAndRoles.facial_recognition_requirements: Should facial recognition be mandatory for all users or only for high-risk actions (e.g. first contract signing, large orders), and how often should users be re-verified?
AuthenticationAndRoles.login_and_authentication: Do you need user login and authentication for shoppers and store managers?
AuthenticationAndRoles.login_and_registration: Do you need both user login and registration on the site, or will users come from an existing account system?
AuthenticationAndRoles.login_and_registration_methods: Which login and registration methods should the app support (e.g. email/password, phone number, social login)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.multi_channel_access_consistency: Should users share the same account and permissions across web platform, mobile app, and mini-program with synchronized data and sessions?
AuthenticationAndRoles.multi_platform_session_handling: Should user sessions and logins be synchronized across web, iOS, and Android apps?
AuthenticationAndRoles.parent_child_role_separation: Should there be separate authenticated roles for parents and children with different permissions and views?
AuthenticationAndRoles.password_management_features: Should the password system include features like password reset, password change after login, and password strength requirements?
AuthenticationAndRoles.password_recovery_and_reset: Do you need password recovery and reset flows for users who forget their credentials?
AuthenticationAndRoles.password_recovery_flow: How should password recovery work (e.g. reset via email link, security questions)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.pc_permission_integration: How should the mobile H5 app synchronize and honor PC-side permission configurations when determining which features a logged-in user can access?
AuthenticationAndRoles.permission_configuration_scope: Should permissions be configurable at the levels of pages, actions (CRUD), data fields, and workflow steps?
AuthenticationAndRoles.persistent_login_sessions: Should user login sessions persist across browser restarts (e.g. 'remember me') or require fresh login each time?
AuthenticationAndRoles.personal_information_management: Which personal profile fields should users be able to view and edit in the personal information management section?
AuthenticationAndRoles.profile_management_scope: What personal information fields should users be able to view and edit in their profile?
AuthenticationAndRoles.real_name_verification_flow: At which stage should real-name authentication occur (e.g. at registration, before first installment application, before contract signing), and what user data must be collected and verified?
AuthenticationAndRoles.registration_approval_flow: Should new user registrations be auto-approved or require manual admin approval?
AuthenticationAndRoles.registration_requirements: What information is required at registration for users and merchants respectively before they can use the system?
AuthenticationAndRoles.role_based_access_control: Do you need different access roles such as end users, support agents, and administrators?
AuthenticationAndRoles.security_settings_scope: Which types of security settings should users be able to manage (e.g. password policies, API keys, IP allowlists, alert thresholds for security events)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.separate_user_roles: Should regular subscribers and content creators be separate roles with different permissions and interfaces?
AuthenticationAndRoles.session_management: Should the system enforce any specific session timeout or re-authentication rules for security?
AuthenticationAndRoles.session_management_requirements: Do you need features like remember-me, session timeout, or simultaneous login limits for users?
AuthenticationAndRoles.session_persistence: Should user login sessions be persistent across browser restarts on mobile (e.g., 'remember me') or always require fresh login?
AuthenticationAndRoles.session_timeout_policy: Should there be a session timeout or auto-logout policy for logged-in users, and if so after how long?
AuthenticationAndRoles.single_session_restriction: How strictly should single sign-on be enforced so that a user cannot operate on multiple devices concurrently (e.g. auto-logout previous sessions, block new logins)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.third_party_account_binding: Should WeChat binding be mandatory for login or an optional link in addition to regular accounts?
AuthenticationAndRoles.user_account_management: Should there be an admin interface to create, disable, and modify user accounts and assign roles?
AuthenticationAndRoles.user_permission_granularity: How granular should user permissions be (e.g. table-level, field-level, action-level for view/create/edit/delete and settings)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.user_registration_flow: What information should be collected during user registration (e.g. email, username, MT4 account ID)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.user_registration_requirements: What information is required during user registration (e.g. email, username, full name, consent checkboxes)?
AuthenticationAndRoles.user_role_types: Which user roles do you need besides teachers and students (e.g., admin, teaching affairs staff), or are only these two roles required?
AuthenticationAndRoles.wechat_account_binding: Should WeChat binding be mandatory for certain actions or simply an optional account linkage for users and merchants?

CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.alarm_and_task_notifications: Do you need real-time notifications (e.g. app push, SMS, email, mini-program notifications) for intelligent alarms, new tasks, status changes, and rescue coordination events?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.alert_channels: Which alert channels should be supported (SMS only, email only, or both, and can users enable multiple channels simultaneously)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.alert_content_customization: What aspects of the alert content should users be able to customize (subject, message body, included fields, language, templates)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.alert_notification_channels: Which channels should be used for alert notifications (e.g. in-app notifications, email, SMS, chat integrations)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.communication_channels: Do you need communication features such as email or in-app notifications to confirm tip submissions, donations, or account changes?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.consultation_communication_channels: Which channels should be supported for online consultation (e.g. text chat, voice, video, in-app messaging)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.email_notifications: Do you need email notifications for events such as user registration, feedback submission, or download confirmations?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.email_reply_behavior: When replying to an email, should the original message be quoted by default and where should the reply be inserted?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.inquiry_notifications: Should the system send email or on-site notifications to admins or merchants when a new product inquiry is submitted?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.internal_message_system: Should the message system work as an internal site messaging feature (e.g., message threads between users and administrators) rather than external email?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.management_client_realtime_communication: Do you need real-time status updates or acknowledgements from clients back to the management end when tasks are received or executed?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_block_or_ignore: Should users be able to block or ignore messages from specific users or channels beyond choosing to ignore them in the UI?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_delivery_guarantees: Should the system guarantee delivery for temporarily offline users (store-and-forward) and show clearly whether messages were delivered or failed?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_display_format: In what format should JMS messages be displayed to the user (raw text, JSON viewer, key–value breakdown, or multiple views)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_moderation_and_reply_flow: Should administrators be able to moderate, delete, and organize messages in addition to replying, and should replies be visible to all users or only to the original sender?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_notifications: What kinds of message notifications do you need (e.g. push notifications, in-app alerts, badge counts)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_read_state: Do you need to track or display message read/unread status or delivery confirmations?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_receiving_mode: Should receiving messages from the JMS server be manual (user clicks to fetch) or automatic streaming/polling with live updates?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_sending_capabilities: What message attributes should users be able to set when sending to the JMS server (e.g. destination, headers, priority, TTL)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.message_types_in_chat: What message types should chat support (e.g. text only, images, files, voice messages)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.notification_and_reminders: Do you need automated notifications for events like installment approval, upcoming payments, overdue status, and contract signing confirmation, and through which channels (email, SMS, in-site messages)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.notification_channels: Do you need notifications (email, SMS, in‑app) for events like new orders, order status updates, recharges, and withdrawals?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.notification_on_task_events: Do you need email or other notifications when timed tasks succeed, fail, or encounter partial errors?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.notifications_for_appointments_and_repor: Do you need notifications or reminders for upcoming appointments and newly available health reports?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.order_confirmation_emails: Do you need automatic email notifications such as order confirmations and payment receipts sent to customers?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.order_notifications: Do you need email or SMS notifications for events such as order placement, payment success, or shipping updates?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.order_status_notifications: Do you need notifications or messages (e.g. mini-program messages) to remind users of their scheduled pickup time or order status?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.product_inquiry_channel: How should users submit inquiries about products (e.g. contact form, on-product Q&A, email link, chat)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.real_time_alert_behavior: Should real-time alerts be sent immediately for every qualifying event or can multiple events be batched into a single notification?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.real_time_chat_capabilities: Should the real-time chat support one-to-one, group chats, or both?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.real_time_message_delivery: Should messages be delivered in near real time to all subscribed users without manual page refresh?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.real_time_messaging_protocol: Which real-time messaging behavior do you need (e.g. typing indicators, online/offline status, message read receipts) beyond basic send and receive?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.realtime_audio_calls: Should the real-time audio call feature support one-to-one only or also group calls, and do you need call controls such as mute, hold, and call duration display?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.reminder_channels: Which channels should reminders and notifications use (e.g. on-site alerts, email, SMS, push notifications)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.reminder_delivery_channels: Which channels should be used for reminder messages (e.g., email, SMS, in‑site notifications, push messages)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.reminder_recipient_scope: Should reminder messages be sent to both teachers and students, or only to students for course appointments?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.reminder_timing: Should users be able to configure how long before an event reminders are sent (e.g. 10 minutes, 1 hour, 1 day)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.reminder_timing_and_rules: Besides the 5‑minute‑before‑class and evaluation reminders, do you need additional reminder timings or retry rules if delivery fails?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.sending_email_capabilities: Should sending emails support additional capabilities such as attachments, signatures, and scheduled send?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.service_notifications: Do you need notifications (via SMS, WeChat, or email) for events such as order creation, payment success, or wash completion?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.support_request_notifications: Do you need email or in-app notifications when support requests are created, updated, or resolved?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.transactional_notifications: Do you need automatic email/SMS/app notifications for events such as registration, order placement, payment success, shipping, and returns?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.user_notification_pattern: Which notification pattern should be used for success and error messages (e.g. toast alerts, inline messages near controls, modal dialogs)?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.whatsapp_integration_scope: Should WhatsApp integration support both one-to-one and group messaging within the app?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.whatsapp_message_synchronization: Do you need two-way synchronization so that messages sent or received directly in WhatsApp are also reflected in the application?
CommunicationAndEmailMessaging.whatsapp_template_usage: Do you need support for predefined WhatsApp message templates for common update notifications?

ConfigurationAndCustomization.account_preferences: Should users be able to configure personal settings such as contact info, preferred payment methods, and notification preferences?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.account_settings_management: What kinds of account and profile settings should users be able to configure (e.g. personal info, security settings, notification preferences)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.alert_frequency_controls: How should users control alert frequency (e.g. per event, minimum interval, daily summary, per-alert-type limits)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.alert_policies_configuration: Which parameters should be configurable in monitoring and alerting policies (e.g. thresholds, aggregation windows, notification channels)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.alert_trigger_conditions: Which types of traffic and user activity conditions should users be able to configure as alert triggers (e.g. thresholds, specific actions, anomalies)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.animation_effect_options: What categories of animation effects should be available for users to select and combine?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.approval_process_configuration: How flexible should approval process configuration be (e.g. multi-step flows, conditional branches, parallel approvals, dynamic approvers)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.automation_rules_configuration: How should users configure operation and maintenance automation rules (e.g. through visual workflows, rule builders, or configuration forms)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.backup_schedule_configuration: Should users be able to configure backup schedules and retention policies from the website?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.blockly_appearance_customization: What aspects of the Blockly appearance should users be able to customize (e.g., toolbox layout, colors, block size, grid and zoom settings)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.blockly_behavior_customization: Which Blockly behaviors should be customizable by users (e.g., snapping, allowed block types, custom toolboxes, custom code generators)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.channel_and_terminal_configuration: Should administrators be able to configure which terminals (H5, WEB, APP, mini-program) are available and how each maps to channels or sections?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.client_grouping_and_configuration: Do you need to group clients and configure settings or scheduled tasks at the group level as well as per individual client?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.cluster_configuration_parameters: Which database cluster configuration parameters should users be allowed to adjust through the UI (e.g., memory limits, connection pools, replication settings)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.code_generation_configuration: Which aspects of the one-key code generation should be configurable (e.g. naming conventions, folder structure, included layers like controllers/models/views/JS/language packages/menus)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.collection_method_configuration: What collection methods should be configurable (e.g. phone calls, emails, SMS, legal notices) and which parameters of each method need to be adjustable?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.communication_preferences: Should users be able to configure messaging preferences such as notification settings or default WhatsApp recipients?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.configuration_categories: How should system settings be grouped (e.g. security, UI, notifications) to make them easy to browse and manage?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.configuration_change_approval: Should changes to system configurations require approval or review before they take effect?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.configuration_change_audit: Should changes to system configuration be versioned or logged with who changed what and when?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.content_display_toggles: Should users be able to individually toggle visibility of title, summary, and publication time for each embedded RSS block?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.content_management_system_scope: What types of content should the CMS manage (e.g. eSIM product descriptions, FAQs, blogs, marketing pages)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.cost_effective_usage_controls: Do you need usage limits, quotas, or cost dashboards to help keep the platform cost-effective for users?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.coupon_configuration: What types of coupons should be supported (e.g. fixed discount, percentage, free shipping) and what usage rules or limitations should apply?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.creator_pricing_configuration: Can each content creator freely configure multiple subscription tiers and prices, or is pricing constrained to platform-defined options?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.cross_protocol_development: Which protocols should cross-protocol development support, and how should users select or switch between them?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.custom_maintenance_cycles: How flexibly should users be able to customize maintenance cycles (per elevator, per component, by usage metrics, by regulation templates)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.custom_maintenance_items: Should users be able to configure their own maintenance item checklists and templates per elevator type or brand?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.database_connection_profiles: Should users be able to save and manage multiple database connection profiles (host, port, credentials, DB type) for future use?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.database_specification_configuration: Should the company database specifications used for automatic auditing be configurable within the platform (e.g., rulesets per project or environment)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.database_type_configuration: Which database types and connection parameters should users be able to configure (e.g., drivers, connection strings, authentication methods)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.deposit_amount_configuration: Should admins be able to configure deposit amounts dynamically per customer or booking, or will there be fixed deposit tiers?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.device_parameter_configuration: What types of device parameters should users be able to configure, and should configuration support bulk edits or scheduling?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.distribution_target_configuration: Which settings should users configure for HTTP distribution targets (e.g., endpoint URLs, headers, authentication, retry policies)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.drag_and_drop_icon_configuration: Should the icon drag-and-drop interface allow configuring actions, navigation targets, and visibility rules for each icon?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.dynamic_block_insertion: How should users add and configure dynamic program blocks within templates (e.g. via code editor, visual blocks, predefined snippets)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.endpoint_configuration: Should users be able to configure which collection endpoints and data collectors are used for each schedule or data flow?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.event_and_process_triggers: Which types of events and process triggers should be supported (e.g. on create, on update, on delete, on status change, scheduled)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.excel_processing_rules: Should there be configurable rules for how Excel data is processed (e.g. header row position, column mappings, validation rules, duplicate handling)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.experiment_parameter_configuration: Which experiment parameters (e.g., aperture, shutter speed, ISO, focal length, lighting) should users be able to configure before running a simulation?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.flavor_customization_options: Which flavor parameters (e.g. sugar level, ice level, milk type, extra shots, syrups) should be available for users to customize in each coffee order?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.form_formula_configuration: Should users configure formulas directly in fields via an expression editor with functions and validation feedback?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.gallery_scheduling_rules: How should timed gallery openings be configured (e.g. start/end times, time zones, recurring schedules, early access rules)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.incremental_extraction_rules: What configuration options should users have to define incremental extraction rules (e.g., time-based, primary key offsets, change tracking columns)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.institution_specific_configuration: Should institutions be able to configure institution-specific fields and rules (e.g. project codes, funding categories, department structures)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.layout_selection_options: Should users be able to switch between list, grid, and card layouts per page/view or set a global default layout for all RSS embeddings?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.localization_and_regional_offers: Do you need CMS-driven localization of content and region-specific eSIM offers?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.looping_and_iteration_features: Which looping capabilities do you need in templates (e.g. iterating over lists, nested loops, index access, break/continue support)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.membership_level_rules: How should membership levels be defined and updated (e.g. based on total spending, points, or manual assignment)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.merchant_activity_configuration: What types of activities or promotions should merchants be able to set up (e.g. discounts, coupons, flash sales, bundled products)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.multi_application_mode: What should multi-application mode enable (e.g., switching between multiple apps, separate configurations, or shared components)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.music_selection_options: How should users select music for the video (e.g. built‑in library, upload their own, or both)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.notification_and_preference_settings: Should users be able to configure preferences such as notification settings for new homework, grades posted, and shared resources?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.payment_link_custom_message: Do you need configurable instructions or custom messages shown to customers on the secure payment link page?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.per_app_time_limit_configuration: Should parents be able to configure different time limits per app or app category rather than a single global limit?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.per_instance_vs_global_config: Should display and content options be configured per embedded RSS block or as global settings applied across the website?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.points_accrual_and_redemption: How should users earn points and in what ways can they redeem points during purchases?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.points_and_discounts_configuration: Should administrators be able to configure global rules for points and discounts (e.g., earning rates, redemption rules, stacking rules)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.process_standard_libraries: Should users be able to define and save multiple process standard templates for different projects or codes?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.process_standard_sharing: Should process standards be shareable across users or teams within the system?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.promotion_configuration: Should administrators or merchants be able to configure group buying and flash sale campaigns themselves (e.g. schedule, pricing, quotas) from the backend?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.promotion_configuration_options: Which configuration options should be available when setting up a promotion (e.g. eligible products, start/end time, usage limits, customer segments)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.proxy_server_configuration_options: What configuration options should be available when setting up HTTP proxy servers (e.g., host, port, authentication, protocol type, labels)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.proxy_settings_scope: Should proxy and Tor configurations be saved per user/session or applied globally for all users of the site?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.publishing_rules_configuration: Do you need configurable rules for automatic publishing per terminal (e.g., default terminals per category, time-based rules, or exclusions)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.qr_code_behavior_configuration: Should admins be able to configure how QR codes map to detailed information (e.g. which Excel fields are shown, which sheet/columns are used)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.regulatory_threshold_configuration: Should administrators be able to configure thresholds and rules that drive intelligent alarms and regulatory dashboard indicators?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.scenario_and_camera_type_selection: What types of cameras and experiment scenarios should be available for users to select when configuring a simulation?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.schedule_based_usage_rules: Do you need schedule-based rules (e.g. school hours, bedtime) in addition to total daily time limits?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.scheduling_parameters_configuration: What scheduling parameters should users be able to configure (e.g. frequency, time windows, concurrency limits, retry rules)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.scoring_rules_configuration: Should organizers be able to configure scoring rules (e.g. points per win, game format, tie-breaking rules) for different activities?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.service_and_pricing_configuration: Should admins be able to configure service items and pricing rules through the website interface?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.site_decoration_and_theming: What decoration capabilities should merchants or admins have (e.g. configurable home page banners, layout modules, theme selection)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.storage_and_delivery_preferences: Should users be able to configure preferences for storage duration, delivery options, and scheduling during purchase?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.system_parameter_configuration: Besides device parameters, do you need configuration for global system parameters (e.g. data retention, alert thresholds, default views)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.system_parameters_scope: Which categories of system parameters should be configurable from the backend (e.g. security settings, feature toggles, email settings)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.taste_preference_configuration: What options should users have to set or update their taste preferences that drive personalized coffee recommendations?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.template_selection: Which types of video templates should users be able to choose from (e.g. aspect ratios, styles, themes)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.template_variable_capabilities: What types of variables and expressions should the template system support (e.g. simple placeholders, conditionals, filters, function calls)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.theme_configuration_controls: Should admins be able to configure and switch corporate theme color sets (including homepage variations) through the website UI?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.theme_customization_for_families: Do you want any configurable settings for families (e.g. font size adjustments, reading mode, or parental controls)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.tor_network_configuration_options: What Tor network settings should users be able to customize (e.g., entry nodes, circuits, region preferences, per-session vs global settings)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.tournament_structure_configuration: Which tournament formats should organizers be able to configure (e.g. round-robin, single elimination, group stage plus knockout, custom rules)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_channel_preferences: Should users be able to configure per-channel preferences (e.g. mute, priority, notification options) for the channels they subscribe to?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_configurable_notifications: Should users be able to configure which reminder messages they receive and how (e.g., enable/disable or change lead time)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_level_vs_global_settings: Should alert settings be configured globally by admins, individually by each user, or both with overrides?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_preferences_and_settings: Do you need user-configurable settings (e.g. notification preferences, saved topics) within the account pages?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_profile_editing_scope: Which personal information fields should users be able to edit in their profiles (e.g., name, contact info, preferences, avatar)?
ConfigurationAndCustomization.user_profile_management: What fields and options should be available in the user center for managing user information (e.g. name, contact info, shipping addresses)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.access_result_handling: What should happen when a remote page fails to load via the chosen proxy or Tor (e.g., error message details, retry options, fallback to another proxy)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.account_information_fields: Which specific account information fields (e.g. name, shipping address, phone, preferences) should users be able to view and edit?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.account_management_flow: What actions should users be able to perform on account pages (edit profile, change password, view donation history, manage saved news)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.account_management_workflow: What actions should be available under email account management (e.g., add/remove accounts, rename, set default, sign-out from a specific account)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.admin_user_creation_flow: When admins create new users, which fields should they set and should users later change them (e.g. email, temporary password)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.after_sales_service_workflow: How should after-sales service requests be created, tracked, and resolved by merchants or support staff?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.alarm_rule_configuration_flow: What fields and steps are required when configuring an alarm rule (e.g. thresholds, conditions, affected devices, notification channels)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.alert_configuration_workflow: Should there be a guided workflow for creating and editing alerts, including conditions, thresholds, channels, and schedules?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.analysis_trigger: Should contract analysis start automatically after upload, or should users manually trigger the analysis?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.api_creation_form_fields: What fields should be captured when creating a new API (e.g. name, path, method, description, version, upstream URL, auth requirements)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.api_editing_workflow: Should editing an API support draft vs published states, validation before saving, and change confirmation dialogs?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.api_request_triggers: What user actions in the React app should trigger API requests (e.g. button click, form submit, page load)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.application_submission_flow: What steps and fields should the application submission workflow include from initial request to completion?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.appointment_form_fields: What information should users be required to enter when making a service appointment (e.g. address, preferred time, contact phone, special requirements)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.area_division_management_flow: Should users be able to create, edit, and delete area divisions on the map, or are areas predefined and read-only?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.audit_result_handling_flow: How should users proceed after viewing audit results (e.g., fix and re-upload, request override, or send to another reviewer) when scripts do not comply?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.authorization_application_flow: What steps and fields should the authorization application workflow include for users?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.bulk_data_operations: Do you need bulk data operations (e.g. bulk edit, bulk delete) on selected records?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.code_example_interaction: Should users be able to interact with code examples (e.g. copy code button, live editable playground, switch between Vue versions)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.commission_settlement_workflow: Should commission calculation and settlement follow specific statuses or time delays (e.g. only after order is confirmed and past refund period)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.comparison_workflow_steps: What are the exact steps of the comparison workflow from upload and database selection through starting the comparison to reviewing and confirming the results?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.compose_email_flow: Which fields and actions are required in the send/compose email workflow (e.g., To/CC/BCC, attachments, rich text formatting, drafts)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.condition_input_format: In what format should users specify conditions (e.g. raw SQL WHERE clause, guided filters, or both)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.configuration_edit_workflow: Should editing system settings support draft, review, and publish steps, or be applied immediately on save?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.configuration_editing_flow: Should system parameter changes be edited inline and saved immediately, or use an explicit edit-and-save form with validation?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.consultation_interaction_mode: Should the consultation module work as real-time chat, a message form with replies, or scheduled appointments, and what information must users provide to initiate a consultation?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.contact_method_channels: Which contact methods should be provided in the easy-to-use contact interface (e.g. form, email, phone, live chat)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.content_aggregation_workflow: Should the system automatically fetch, process, and summarize content on a schedule, or only when triggered manually by a user or admin?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.content_crud_operations: Which content operations should be available directly in the UI (add, delete, edit, duplicate, undo/redo)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.content_editing_capabilities: Which content editing capabilities do you need inside a funnel page (e.g. drag-and-drop sections, text editing, image/video blocks, forms)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.content_moderation_for_submissions: Do you need an approval or moderation step before uploaded works appear publicly in the showcase?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.content_sorting_controls: How should users control sorting of content (purely by drag-and-drop order, or also by automatic sort options like date or title)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.contract_signing_flow: How should the contract signing process work for users (e.g. e-sign via one-time code, facial recognition confirmation, downloadable PDF), and at which point is the contract considered legally effective?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.control_handling_workflow: What are the steps and possible statuses when handling a real-time warning message (e.g. received, in process, verified, closed)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.conversion_format_selection: Which options for conversion format selection should be available to users (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB, generic JSON-based NoSQL)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.conversion_results_handling: Should users be able to download, export, or save the conversion results within the application after processing?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.course_publication_workflow: What information should teachers provide when publishing a course (e.g., title, description, time slots, price, online/offline location, capacity)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.creator_onboarding_flow: What information and verification steps are required in the onboarding flow for new content creators?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.crud_operation_scope: Should CRUD operations support bulk actions, inline editing, and validation rules tied to approval status?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.crud_operations_scope: Which specific data entities should support create, edit, and delete operations in the application?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.custom_report_workflow: What is the expected workflow for users to generate custom reports (e.g. select data sources, choose fields, define filters, schedule exports)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.customer_information_entry: What customer information fields should be captured and editable (e.g. contact details, billing/shipping addresses, payment terms)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_analysis_workflow: Should users be able to define reusable analysis workflows or run predefined analyses on selected product datasets?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_analysis_workflows: What sequence of actions should users follow to perform data analysis once data is integrated (e.g. select dataset, choose analysis method, run, review results)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_backup_and_recovery: Do you need scheduled automatic backups, on-demand backups, and granular recovery (e.g. restore specific datasets vs full system restore)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_browsing_and_pagination: How should data browsing be handled in the admin panel (e.g. pagination size, infinite scroll, batch selection for operations)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_cleaning_workflow: Which steps should the data cleaning workflow include (e.g. deduplication, outlier handling, missing values, validation)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_collection_flow: How should BT seed magnetic link information be collected (e.g. manual submission form, automated crawlers, API import), and who is allowed to initiate the collection?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_deletion_behavior: Should data deletion be hard delete, soft delete with recoverable records, or require multi-step confirmation?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_development_workflow: What are the main steps in the data development workflow on the site (e.g. authoring, testing, code review, scheduling, deployment)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_editing_flow: How should users access and modify existing data entries (e.g. inline editing in a table, separate edit form, or modal dialog)?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_entry_fields_to_collect: What specific data fields should users be able to enter for each record that will appear in the charts?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_entry_forms: What fields and validation rules should the data entry forms include for creating and editing records?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_entry_validation_rules: What validation rules are needed for environmental data entry (e.g. required fields, numeric ranges, allowed units)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_entry_workflow_steps: Should data entry follow a multi-step workflow (e.g. draft, review, approve) or be saved directly as final records?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_import_sources: Which data import sources/formats do you need to support (e.g. CSV upload, Excel, database connections, APIs)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_import_validation: Should the data import process include schema validation and error reporting before data is accepted?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_integration_workflows: What are the main steps users should follow to configure and run data integration workflows between different systems?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_item_identification: What identifiers should users provide when creating data items (e.g., key name only, key plus namespace, optional description or tags)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_modification_operations: Should insert, update, and delete operations be performed via free-form SQL, structured forms, or a combination of both?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_update_workflow: What is the typical workflow for updating data (e.g. select record, edit fields, review changes, then submit for saving)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_upload_types: What types of data should the management end support for upload (e.g. images, videos, documents, real-time feeds)?
DataEntryAndWorkflows.data_validation_rules: Should data updates be validated with specific rules or required fields before they can be saved?

DataEntryAndWorkflows.withdrawal_constraints: What constraints should apply to withdrawals (e.g. minimum amount, fees, daily limits, review or approval steps)?

FileAndPlaybackHandling.application_download_flow: Do you need a direct file download from the web app, redirection to app stores, or both for downloading the application?

FileAndPlaybackHandling.download_output_quality: Should the processed files maintain original resolution and quality or be compressed/adjusted?

FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_access_monitoring_scope: Should file access history cover all files on the device or be limited to specific folders or file types (e.g. photos, videos, downloads)?

FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_download_behavior: Should file downloads start immediately, open in a new tab, or present a confirmation dialog before downloading?
FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_import_formats: Which file formats besides CAD (e.g., DWG, DXF) need to be supported for import?
FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_management_actions: Which file management actions should be supported (e.g. rename, move, delete, versioning)?
FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_management_capabilities: Which file management capabilities should the panel provide (e.g., upload/download, create folders, edit files online, set permissions)?

FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_size_limits: What maximum file size should be allowed for contract uploads?
FileAndPlaybackHandling.file_sync_behavior: Should file synchronization support incremental updates, conflict handling, and logs of which files were successfully processed?

NavigationAndPages.order_status_pages: Should there be a dedicated order center with status-based tabs (e.g. pending payment, shipped, completed, canceled)?

NavigationAndPages.rss_embedding_locations: Should RSS information be embeddable on any article or page, or only on specific page types or sections?
NavigationAndPages.schedule_view_types: Which schedule views should be available for browsing (e.g. daily, weekly, monthly, list view)?

NavigationAndPages.user_and_merchant_portals: Should users and merchants have separate portal areas or dashboards, and which main pages should each portal contain?

OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_analysis_services: Do you need any flow where users request or schedule analysis runs or reports as a service rather than running them manually?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_control_functions: Should all logged-in users be allowed to publish controls and handle warnings, or do different users have different permissions for these actions?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_inspection_services: Do you need any request or assignment mechanism for starting self-inspections or supervision tasks, or are they always available to eligible users by default?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_messaging_features: Should access to publishing, subscribing, and channel management be restricted based on any conditions (e.g. login status, role, subscription plan)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_monitoring_and_reports: Should access to real-time monitoring and report generation be limited to certain user roles or available to all authenticated users?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_monitoring_capabilities: Should access to monitoring and alerting capabilities depend on a subscription tier or plan, or is everything available to all logged-in users?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_optimization_actions: Should users be able to trigger optimization actions (e.g. index suggestions, config tweaks) directly from the interface, or is the site read-only monitoring and analysis?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_real_time_data: Should access to real-time data be restricted to logged-in users only, or can some data be viewed without login?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.access_to_scanning_feature: Should all logged-in users be able to scan QR codes, or should access to scanning be limited by role or additional permissions?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.activity_creation_access: Who should be allowed to create new badminton activities or tournaments (any logged-in user, only organizers, or only admins)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.admin_access_scope: Do you need any access control over which environments or databases (e.g. staging vs production) admins can connect to from the panel?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.aggregated_code_payment: How should the aggregated code payment function work (e.g., static QR per merchant vs dynamic per transaction, who generates and scans the code)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.application_prerequisites: Should users meet any prerequisites or resource conditions before they can submit an application for a resource?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.appointment_as_order_model: Should each course appointment be treated like an order with statuses (e.g., pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled), or just a simple booking record?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.appointment_scheduling_rules: What constraints should apply when users make appointments (e.g. time slots, lead time, cancellation rules)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.automatic_order_processing: Should orders be considered confirmed automatically after successful payment, or do you need any manual review or approval step?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.banking_services_coverage: Besides transfers, payments, and balance inquiry, which additional banking services should the app provide access to (e.g. fund purchases, loans, card management)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.cart_persistence: Should the shopping cart persist between sessions for the same user, and if so, for how long?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.checkout_process_requirements: Which checkout features do you need (e.g. promo codes, multiple payment methods, billing address collection)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.cluster_provisioning_flow: Should building a new cluster follow a guided provisioning flow similar to ordering a service (with review and confirmation steps)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.collection_plan_assignment: Should collection plans be assigned to specific collectors or teams, and if so, how is this assignment decided?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.component_download_flow: Should downloading a component be a direct click download or go through a detail page with license/usage information first?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.connection_management: Do you need users to create, save, and reuse multiple named database connections with different credentials and settings?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.consultation_session_access: How should users start and join an online consultation after booking (e.g. join from appointment detail, timed entry)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.conversation_list_prioritization: Should chat and group conversations be ordered by most recent activity, pinned items, or another prioritization rule?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.course_access_model: Should users access courses freely after login or is there any enrollment, purchase, or subscription step required before they can start learning?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.course_enrollment_flow: What is the flow for users to select and enroll in courses (e.g. add to learning plan, one-click enroll, prerequisites check)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.database_selection_scope: Which databases or database connections should users be able to select from when initiating a comparison?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.demand_supply_matching_model: How should matching between errand demands and service providers work (open marketplace where providers pick orders, or direct assignment/dispatch)?

OrderingAndServiceAccess.send_scheduling: Do you need the ability to schedule 5G messages for future sending instead of sending only immediately?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_access_scope: Do you need any flow for placing fuel or product orders, or is the site purely for back-office management of existing records?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_area_and_availability: Do you need to restrict appointments based on merchant/service provider service areas and available time slots?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_booking_scope: Should users be able to book only one specific service from the landing page or choose among multiple service options before opening Calendly?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_request_creation: Should property managers or owners be able to actively create service requests (maintenance, repair, rescue) in addition to system-generated tasks from intelligent alarms?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_selection_flow: Should users select one or multiple service items per order, and can they edit the selection before confirming?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.service_subscription_or_one_off: Are storage and delivery services one-off per order, or should users be able to manage ongoing storage with multiple deliveries over time?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.session_persistence: Should game rooms persist if the host leaves or all players disconnect, or should they be destroyed automatically?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.shipping_and_delivery_options: Do you need to support multiple shipping options and delivery methods during order placement?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.shipping_and_fulfillment_flow: How should the shipping process work from merchant side (e.g. confirm order, print waybill, update tracking number, mark as shipped)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.shipping_options_and_rules: Which shipping options should be available (e.g. standard, express, pickup) and how should shipping fees be calculated?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.shopping_and_checkout_flow: What is the expected purchase flow in the peripheral mall from product browsing to order confirmation (e.g. product detail page, cart, checkout, order success)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.shopping_cart_behavior: Should the shopping cart support multiple eSIM profiles at once and be persistent across sessions and devices?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.simultaneous_database_sessions: Should users be able to connect to and interact with multiple databases at the same time within one session (e.g. multiple active connections in tabs)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.subject_selection_flow: How should users select their subject of interest for testing (e.g. from a fixed list of subjects, search, or filters)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.subscription_management: Should users be able to pause, cancel, and renew subscriptions directly from their subscription management page?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.subscription_model: What subscription options should be supported (e.g. free follow, paid monthly subscription, one-time purchase)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.subscription_models: What subscription models should be supported (e.g. monthly per-creator, bundles, free trials)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.subscription_or_purchase_model: Do you need in-app purchase or subscription flows for accessing the parental control features?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.supported_payment_methods: Should users be able to select only between WeChat and Alipay or also see additional payment options for recharge?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.template_publish_and_activation: Do you need a concept of publishing/activating templates versus keeping them in draft, and controls to switch which template is active for a given use case?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.ticket_verification_process: How should the verification and admission process work for users at the scenic area (e.g. QR code generation and scanning, one-time vs multiple-use entry)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.tour_booking_or_ticketing: Do you need any booking or ticketing functionality for scenic spots (e.g., reserving visits, purchasing tickets) in addition to pure information management?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.trading_constraints: Do you need constraints on trading with mock funds (e.g. max position size, daily trade limits, restricted symbols)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.virtual_currency_usage_scope: What in-app actions or services besides withdrawal should be payable using knowledge coins?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.visit_reservation_flow: What is the expected flow for visit reservations (select date/time, number of visitors, confirmation steps, and any constraints like time slots or quotas)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.voucher_redemption_limitations: Should there be rules for voucher usage during verification (e.g. partial use, expiry checks, per-order quantity limits)?
OrderingAndServiceAccess.wallet_usage_scenarios: For the wallet, what operations should be supported (top-up, pay, withdraw, transfer) and in which user journeys?

DomainDataElements.pricing_components_definition: Which pricing components need to be modeled as data (e.g. base service price, vehicle-type surcharge, membership discount)?

DomainDataElements.product_attributes: Which key product attributes should be displayed (e.g. name, images, description, price, stock status, specifications)?
DomainDataElements.product_attributes_and_specifications: Which product attributes besides size, color, and material should be defined for each item (e.g. firmness, dimensions, weight, warranty, care instructions)?
DomainDataElements.product_attributes_for_display: Which attributes should be shown for tea leaves and tea utensils (e.g. origin, type, effects, taboos, brewing instructions, material, size, price, stock)?
